program: Master of Science in Computer Science

toefl.notes: Full admission requires 103 or higher. Scores 79-102 require limited status admission.

gre.notes: GRE is not required for the MS CS program.

description_for_vector_db: The UIUC MS CS is a research-oriented degree that requires 28 credit hours of coursework and 4 credit hours of thesis. It is highly competitive and provides full financial support through assistantships (RA/TA) for most students.
